sect2.title: Installation of GCC
sect2.para: Install GCC by running the following commands. These commands will build the C and C++ compiler. Other compilers are available within the gcc package. If you want to build all the other availble compilers too, leave out the --enable-languages=c,c++ option in the configure command. See the GCC documentation for more details on which additional compilers are available.
Note: the build of other compilers is not barely tested by the people working on LFS.
